attributes.action: Increase the pay of paper rounds by giving it a standard rate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the current rates of pay for teenagers who do paper-rounds is not standardised as it should be. People doing similar number of papers are getiing payed ridiculously different amounts, and this is why i believe that pay should be standadised. A bag of 30 papers can weigh around two stone, which can them give teenagers back problems in the future.

rejection.details: Please provide more detail - do you mean standardised by weight, by number of copies delivered or something else?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
